item.title: Valentine's Day 2019
item.description: In this short project, I hope to draw a heart through an animation of appearing dots. library("gganimate") library("ggforce") library("tidyverse") Draw a Heart Here I will place two circles centered at \((\pm 1, 1)\) with the same radius \(r = \sqrt{2}\). circles <- data.frame( x0 = c(-1,1), y0 = rep(1,2), r = rep(1, 2) ) right_pt <- (sqrt(2) + 1) / sqrt(2) left_pt <- -1*right_pt f <- function(x){abs(x) - sqrt(2)} ggplot(data.frame(x = c(left_pt, right_pt)), aes(x)) + coord_fixed() + geom_circle(aes(x0 = x0, y0 = y0, r = r), data = circles, inherit.
